name: MP3 File Format
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">mp3</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: De facto file format for sound that wraps MP3_ENC bitstreams, which may be post- or prepended by the informally specified ID3 metadata blocks.
